name: INVoiceShortcut
desc: A shortcut the user added to Siri.

items.name: var identifier: UUID
items.desc: The unique identifier for the shortcut.

items.name: var invocationPhrase: String
items.desc: The phrase the user speaks to invoke the shortcut.

items.name: var shortcut: INShortcut
items.desc: The shortcut Siri invokes when the user speaks the invocation phrase.
